name: Sound Recall
description:
A good and simple game for children of all ages, about memorizing a sequence of sounds, shapes and colors.

The game will play a growing sequence of notes, and you have to push the corresponding buttons, and see how long a sequence you can memorize.

Different game modes challenge you on memorizing shape and sound, or sound alone.

A good brain trainer, and a new challenge every time.

The game is universal, and designed for both iPad as well as iPhone and iPod touch.
